com.inmobi.grill.lib.query
Class HadoopFileFormatter

java.lang.Object
  com.inmobi.grill.lib.query.AbstractOutputFormatter
      com.inmobi.grill.lib.query.AbstractFileFormatter
          com.inmobi.grill.lib.query.HadoopFileFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileFormatter, QueryOutputFormatter
public class HadoopFileFormatter
extends AbstractFileFormatter

A hadoop file formatter This has capability to create output on Hadoop compatible files systems, with hadoop supported compression codecs.
